description: Animals competing in silly sports with questionable rules

scenarios.title: The Ostrich Olympics
scenarios.content: Ozzie the Ostrich claims ostriches are the best athletes because they can run the fastest. But the other animal athletes argue that many factors determine athletic ability beyond just speed.
scenarios.audioScript:
Ozzie: [proudly] "Check out my latest post! üèÖ #OstrichesAreBestAthletes"

Terry Cheetah: [annoyed] "Just because you can run fast doesn't mean you're the best athlete. I'm pretty speedy too, you know!"

Ellie Elephant: [calmly] "There's more to sports than speed. It takes strength, stamina, agility... No single animal is best at everything."

Mo Monkey: [enthusiastically] "Yeah! I may not be the fastest, but my acrobatics are unmatched on the uneven bars!"

Ozzie: [dismissively] "Pfft, minor details. Everyone knows that when it comes to athletics, speed is king! üëë"
scenarios.claim: Ostriches are the best athletes because they can run the fastest.

logicalFallacies.example: Ozzie assumes being the fastest runner makes ostriches the best athletes overall.
